Title: The Special-Squad's Frontline Man! Break Gurudo's Spell
Writer: Keiji Terui, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryûsei Nakao
Plot: Gohan and Krillin fight to survive against Guldo, a member of the Ginyu Force who possesses awesome psychic abilities! With Goku still in space and Vegeta their only ally, things look bleak for Earth's heroes.
